item.description:
I think you'll find this an interesting and important eventâ€”
A Forum on Sustainability
Mayflower Room, Town Hall

Water, Water, Everywhere, But . . . Our Water Supply; Is it clean? Who owns it? Will it last? Is it protected?

Introduction: Senator Therese Murray
Main Speaker: Scott Horsley, Consulting Hydrologist and President of Horsley Witten

Panelists:
George Crombie -‐ Norwich University Senior Faculty Member and President, American Public Works Association
Valerie Massard -‐ Plymouth Town Planner
Mark Garrett -‐ Plymouth Planning Board Chair
Malcolm MacGregor -‐ Former Plymouth Planning Board Chair and Regular Hiker with the Friends of MSSF Meetup Group

Sponsored by the Plymouth Area League of Woman Voters

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Water, Water Everywhere, But . . . A Forum on Sustainability
